snippet: LeBron James seemed to alternate fouls and fumbles, but he heated up in the fourth quarter and wound up with a game-high 32 points.
abstract: Miami Heat forward LeBron James scores game-high 32 points in Game 3 playoff victory over New York Knicks; Heat leads the series, 3-0. (M)
lead_paragraph: LeBron James played the role of D.J. in the Heat's locker room before taking the court for Game 3 at Madison Square Garden on Thursday night. The first song he selected was by the rap duo Outkast, ''Da Art of Storytellin' (Part 1).'' In the first three quarters of James's New York playoff debut, James was more outcast than most valuable player. He was ineffective on offense. On defense, he picked up his fourth foul with more than seven minutes remaining in the third quarter.

headline.main: Foul Trouble Can't Keep James Down
